snippet: The Columbus Blue Jackets made it 12 straight wins Friday night, defeating the Montreal Canadiens 2-1 to maintain the best record in the NHL....
lead_paragraph: The Columbus Blue Jackets made it 12 straight wins Friday night, defeating the Montreal Canadiens 2-1 to maintain the best record in the NHL.

headline.main: Columbus Defeats Montreal 2-1 for 12th Win in a Row
headline.print_headline: Columbus Defeats Montreal 2-1 for 12th Win in a Row
